sources.title: Harvey | Full Movie | Action Mystery Thriller | Johnny Alonso
sources.description:
Stuck in a small town while taking after his lackluster mother, Harvey begins to resent everything and everyone around him. After a mental breakdown he awakes to realize the nightmare about to unfold; A foggy memory, and a pushy Sheriff claim murder.
2021.  Stars: Johnny Alonso, Erin O'Brien, Darius Autry

metadata.Plot: The classic stage hit gets the Hollywood treatment in the story of Elwood P. Dowd who makes friends with a spirit taking the form of a human-sized rabbit named Harvey that only he sees (and a few privileged others on occasion also.) After his sister tries to commit him to a mental institution, a comedy of errors ensues. Elwood and Harvey become the catalysts for a family mending its wounds and for romance blossoming in unexpected places.
metadata.Writer: Mary Chase, Oscar Brodney, Myles Connolly
metadata.Actors: James Stewart, Wallace Ford, William H. Lynn
